segments.text: I ’ d like to talk to you for a second , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to know why you ’ re always taking credit for work we ’ Ve done together like that line in the new Ice Cream ad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That was my line , Mark . I know we worked on the ad together , but that was definitely my line .
segments.speaker: S2
